title: Simplify Development Task UI by removing clutter
description: Remove Branch display, PR status text, and Rebase button from Development Task cards to create a cleaner, more focused interface that highlights essential information
asA: project manager using the AIPM workspace
iWant: simplified Development Task cards with only essential elements
soThat: I can focus on core task details without visual distractions and improve workflow efficiency
acceptanceCriteria: Branch name paragraph is not rendered in task cards
Default 'PR created and ready for development' status text is removed
Rebase button is hidden from task actions
Essential elements remain visible: assignee input and Generate Code button
